channel.title: Administration on Child
channel.description: Recent content in Administration on Child

item.title: Install Child
item.description: Current limitations Child doesn’t support linking over TLS/SSL to an ircd. The current recommendation is to link to a local ircd on the local interface (127.0.0.1). Dependencies Compile child Prepare MySQL Configure unrealircd Configure Child Start Child Register your first user Dependencies Install dependencies, example debian-based OSes: apt install git libmariadb-dev-compat libmariadbclient-dev libc-dev libssl-dev cmake check Compile child git clone https://github.
